[ U ] (also solemnness, uk/ˈsɒl.əm.nəs/ us/ˈsɑːl.əm.nəs/) the quality of being serious: solemnity of the solemnity of a funeral service solemnities [ plural ]
the ways of behaving or the activities that are considered suitable for a serious, formal, social ceremony, such as a funeral: Preparations are being made for the funeral solemnities.
